@graph.name: Brooke Group Ltd. v. Brown & Williamson Tobacco Corp.
@graph.reasoning: The evidence cannot support a finding that Brown & Williamson's alleged scheme was likely to result in oligopolistic price coordination and sustained supracompetitive pricing in the generic segment of the national cigarette market.

@graph.name: Brooke Group Ltd. v. Brown & Williamson Tobacco Corp.
@graph.reasoning: The evidence is plainly sufficient to support the jury's finding that B&W's price discrimination had a reasonable possibility of injuring competition in the cigarette market as a whole.
